about_the_game:
BloodSworn is an intense, FPS Roguelite where players navigate through various levels with an arsenal of diverse weapons and magic in a blood-soaked, and terrifying adventure. The game is drenched in gore and populated by foes that include tortured cult members, blood priests, fanatics, and a myriad of grotesque creatures.





- Bloodsworn is an action-packed roguelite first-person shooter where you have the option to confront the cult either solo or alongside two additional players.

- Each escaped cult member possesses unique abilities; select the one that aligns with your strengths and face the cult in this grim and violent world.

- Gain access to new relics, weaponry, and additional rewards by accomplishing achievements. Harness the blood of your adversaries to enhance your existing armaments, or opt to accumulate it for future use within your camp to acquire lasting improvements.



Within the realm of Bloodsworn, a brutal and merciless sect has seized control of the world, aiming to summon their god into our realm by spilling the blood of millions. Upon breaching four seals within the "Shaping of Flesh and Blood" tome, the world underwent a transformation, inflicting irreparable harm upon its denizens. Over the years, billions met their demise, and the leaders of the cult unleashed unimaginable forces, surpassing the horrors of even our darkest nightmares. In this grim, blood-drenched, and torment-filled world, escaped members of the cult must utilize all available methods to prevent the breaching of the last seal, as it would bring about the arrival of the deity revered by the cult.

short_description: Bloodsworn is a fast-paced, FPS roguelite game set in a blood-soaked, dark dimension. As a fugitive member of a cruel and twisted cult, you must take revenge on them alone or with the help of your friends. Whether you choose blood magic, guns or melee weapons, your path will be lined with blood.
